ModMetaData.name: Better Message Placement - Dev Build
ModMetaData.author: Dyrewulfe
ModMetaData.description: Dynamically adjusts the location messages are written at, to avoid blocking the colonist bar. (This is the dev version of Better Message Placement. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
